channel.title: Coaches Bro Dies?
channel.description:
Well, back in the first day of school, our coach (Bangladeshy), named Coach Shahid, was the most WORST coach I ever met. I seriously wanted to be super mad at him. Then, at March 18[sup]th[/sup], 2012, my coach went, unkown where he was. Everyone in the school wondered and wondered, until March 20[sup]th[/sup], the news came that my coaches older brother had died. He went for 3 days to Houston (where his brother died) and came back. Our P.E. class was on March 24[sup]th[/sup] and when that day came, I didn't know what to do with him. To be honest, if I talked about his brother, he might be even more sad, but if I don't talk to him about his brother, then he'll think I don't care.
[i]What should I do?[/i]
